#summary Description about the ScreenViewer Function
#labels Phase-Implementation

= Requirements = 

all Platforms and Combinations (Mac,Windows,Linux) all you need is Java version greater 1.4.2 (1.4.2 was release June 26, 2003 ... current version is 1.6.0) or you will need to [http://java.sun.com/products/javawebstart/download.jsp download] Java Web Start from Sun based on [http://java.sun.com/products/javawebstart/ JavaWebStart]

= Description =

  * Its a simple Viewer which will work on 99% of all systems. 
  * Up to 4 People (in a conference every User) will be able to share its screen 
  * You can alter the Quality while running. 
  * You will be able to zoom to a area on your desktop
  * it is integrated into whiteboard sothat you or others (the moderater of the conference)  can draw over the shared screen while sharing is running
  * Sharing Client and Viewing Client get notifications of bad bandwidth
